advantages.title: Advantages
items: Fast winnings paid to your bank
Same Game Multi for bigger combos
Same Race Multi across top finishes
advantages.advantagesAfterText: We’re built for smooth, confident play: find events fast, place bets in seconds, and enjoy an experience that keeps the action flowing. Our promos, reward mechanics, and loyalty benefits are designed to boost value and keep every session exciting from start to finish.

history.title: About Midasbet
history.description1: We stand out with quick bet placement and powerful multi options for sport and racing. We back your play with clear promos and rewarding mechanics that keep value high every session.
items: Winnings up to A$10,000 per bet.
Bonus bets up to A$50 weekly.
history.description2: We built MidasBet as a modern casino-style wagering space where speed, clarity, and player comfort come first. Switching between sport and racing is seamless, so you can find the next event quickly and build your bet slip without friction. Racing is a core focus for us, with strong coverage across formats and a wide range of bet types—from straightforward outcomes to deeper combinations.
history.description3:
For sport, we support the major codes and competitions so you can play on the matches you care about in one clean interface. We power up your sessions with Same Game Multi and Same Race Multi, letting you create richer combos and enjoy bigger, more engaging plays. 
Our promo ecosystem is built around activity: you’ll regularly see special offers, featured-market promos, and themed campaigns that keep the experience fresh. We run seasonal activations tied to major sporting weeks and key racing dates, giving you more reasons to jump in. Alongside that, our loyalty program turns every wager into progress—earn points and unlock benefits as you play. 
We prioritise security and player protection, so we follow standard identity verification to safeguard accounts and payouts. We support convenient deposit and withdrawal options to keep your balance under control and your winnings moving smoothly. Whenever you need help, our support team is ready to assist with bets, payments, and responsible play limits.

customHtml.title: Entry Rules and Responsible Play at Our Casino
customHtml.description:
We welcome players who meet the legal age requirement and ask that you have valid identification ready when needed. Access and play are for the account owner only, so your registration details must be accurate and up to date. We protect fair play and security, which is why we follow verification processes and may request ID before processing withdrawals. We expect respectful conduct towards other players and our support team. We prohibit fraud, the use of someone else’s payment methods, and the creation of multiple accounts to bypass rules. We don’t allow automated tools or software that interferes with platform integrity or creates an unfair advantage. We support responsible play and encourage setting limits so wagering stays entertainment-first. We recommend playing only with funds set aside for leisure and avoiding chasing losses. We may pause transactions if we detect security or rules issues. We aim for transparency, with conditions for bets, settlements, and promos available within your account and rules sections.


Entry and Participation Conditions

  • • Age and ID: play is for adults only, and ID may be requested at sign-up or cashout.
  • • One account per player: one profile, real details, personal use only.
  • • Fair play: manual wagering without third-party interference.

Prohibited Conduct

  • • Fraud and rule evasion: schemes, multi-accounts, identity manipulation.
  • • Payment misuse: third-party cards/accounts, mismatched details.
  • • Promo abuse: attempting to benefit outside promo terms.

Responsible Play

  • • Limits: set deposit and wagering limits in your settings.
  • • Breaks: use cool-off periods and self-exclusion when needed.
  • • Time control: enable reminders to track session length.

Licensing and Security: How We Protect Your Play and Data

We operate within a regulated environment and design our processes to keep play transparent and settlements accurate and reliable. Our model is built around identity standards, financial safeguards, and a responsible approach to wagering. We maintain internal compliance policies so player protection is a daily operational priority, not a checkbox.


We protect your account through layered security: secure access controls, suspicious activity monitoring, and verification for key actions. When required, we request identity documents—this helps prevent unauthorised access and keeps withdrawals protected. It also supports promo fairness and helps stop misuse.


Data transmission across our infrastructure is secured with modern encryption protocols so personal and financial information stays private. We use protected connections for login, payments, and profile management, and we apply extra checks on sensitive actions. This reduces interception risk and strengthens resilience against external threats.


Our privacy approach follows data minimisation principles: we collect only what’s needed to service your account, process payments, and meet security requirements. Access is controlled internally and limited to role-based necessity. Data is stored in secured environments and key actions are logged to prevent unauthorised handling.


We also prioritise payment safety by using established payment rails and matching account and payee details to ensure correct payouts. If anything looks unusual, we may pause a transaction briefly to confirm details—this protects you from errors and fraud attempts. For us, security is part of premium service, and we continually strengthen controls and processes.


Customer Support — Fast, Clear, and Player-First

We shape support so you get help exactly when you need it—whether it’s picking a market, confirming a settlement, setting limits, or checking payout status. Our specialists focus on practical solutions and stay with you through to resolution, not just the first reply. We assist with navigation, wagering rules, promo queries, and transaction updates. We value your time, so we prioritise quick responses and clear step-by-step guidance. We follow safe verification procedures to protect your information and prevent third-party access. We can also guide you through account checks and document preparation to keep withdrawals running smoothly. We handle complex cases individually and log interactions so you can continue without repeating details. Our tone stays friendly and respectful, and we treat every question seriously. We aim for transparency, so you understand what’s happening and what comes next. We keep improving our knowledge base to ensure answers stay accurate and current.


Contact Channels

  • • Live chat: quick help with bets, promos, and payments.
  • • Email: detailed queries and document-friendly support.
  • • Phone: fast assistance for urgent and security-related matters.

Response Times and Service Quality

  • • Live chat: typically 1–3 minutes to first response.
  • • Email: typically 2–6 hours within the service cycle.
  • • Complex matters: end-to-end guidance with clear explanations.

Language Availability

  • • English: primary support language.
  • • Additional languages: available on request via chat/email when needed.

customHtml_2.title: Title for custom section
customHtml_2.description:
MidasBet Loyalty Program — Rewards on Every Wager

Our loyalty program is built for players who enjoy consistent play and want meaningful perks for staying active. Every bet you place contributes to your progress: earn points, move up tiers, and unlock stronger benefits. We keep it simple—more regular play means more rewards and more personalised offers. Points accrue across sport and racing, and special promos can add extra boosts to your balance. Tiers are designed to feel rewarding at every step, from entry-level perks through to higher-value offers and VIP-style benefits. As your status rises, you’ll see more tailored promotions that match the markets you enjoy most. Rewards can be used as bonus bets, entries into prize draws, and special play activations. We also refresh earning mechanics so the program stays dynamic and worthwhile. Tier progress is transparent and visible in your account. Responsible play remains central, with tools to manage limits while you enjoy the perks. The result is more value without extra complexity—just play the way you like and get rewarded.


How to Join

  • • Create an account and verify your profile details.
  • • Enable loyalty participation in the rewards section.
  • • Place wagers—points are added automatically.

Tiers and How to Reach Them

  • • Bronze: from 0 points — entry tier, core perks.
  • • Silver: from 500 points — more bonus bets and tailored promos.
  • • Gold: from 2,000 points — stronger rewards and priority offers.
  • • Platinum: from 5,000 points — expanded perks and VIP activations.
  • • Diamond: from 10,000 points — maximum personalisation and exclusive bonuses.

Rewards and Benefits

  • • Bonus bets: up to A$10–A$100 depending on tier.
  • • Cashback/returns: up to 10% on selected markets.
  • • Enhanced odds boosts: up to +25% on featured events.
  • • VIP prize draws: prizes up to A$5,000 in seasonal promos.
  • • Faster payouts: priority handling at higher tiers.

Bonuses and Special Offers — More Thrill in Every Session

We run regular promotions designed to lift your wagering experience and give you more reasons to play your favourite markets. Our offers span sport and racing, covering featured events, key matchups, and headline race days. We focus on formats that are easy to understand and quick to use: bonus bets, enhanced odds, money-back promos, prize draws, and seasonal campaigns. Joining is usually simple—activate the offer and place qualifying wagers under the conditions. We also run themed weeks where rewards scale with streaks or selected market participation. Big sporting weekends and peak racing dates get extra attention, with boosted promos and added prize opportunities. For combo players, we deliver multi-focused promos where the reward grows with the number of legs in your bet slip. We also host instant-win style activations that can drop rewards while you’re actively playing. We keep conditions clear so you know how to qualify and when rewards are credited. Promos refresh frequently, ensuring there’s always something new to explore. We balance entertainment with control, so you can opt in selectively and manage limits as you go.


Bonus Types and Examples

  • • Enhanced odds: boosts up to +25% on selected markets and featured events.
  • • Bonus Bets: up to A$10–A$200 for meeting promo conditions.
  • • Money Back offers: up to A$50 when a promo rule triggers on select races.
  • • Multi promos: up to A$100 on multis with 3+ legs.
  • • Seasonal campaigns: prize pools up to A$5,000 during major sporting weeks.
  • • Weekly challenges: earn up to A$30 for completing wagering streaks.
  • • Surprise drops: instant bonus bets up to A$20 during active sessions.

Popular Games and Markets — Sport, Racing, and Smart Combos

Our most popular “games” are sport and racing markets delivered in a fast, intuitive format where you can pick a market, view odds, and build your bet slip in seconds. Players love the depth of racing options and the clear structure that supports both immediate action and future-focused plays. On the sports side, the most loved codes offer straightforward outcomes plus extra markets for sharper strategies. We also support multi formats so you can combine markets within a single match or shape richer plays within a single race. We keep navigation simple, with core categories easy to reach and the bet slip always close by, helping you wager with confidence. In racing, you can choose from a wide spread of bet types, from basics to combinations, and build your own style over time. In sport, expanded markets help you tailor strategies to teams, periods, and match scenarios. We also feature “events of the day” so you spend less time searching and more time playing. Our goal is clear choice, smooth mechanics, and strong session flow every time you log in.


Popular Formats

  • • Thoroughbred Racing: outcomes and combo plays on headline meetings.
  • • Greyhound Racing: fast action and frequent events on the schedule.
  • • Harness Racing: dedicated lines and deeper market options.
  • • AFL: match markets and season futures.
  • • NRL: key-game markets and ladder scenarios.
  • • Soccer: results, totals, and half-time markets.
  • • Tennis: set and game markets for precise strategy.
  • • Same Game Multi: combine markets within one match.
  • • Same Race Multi: top-4 finish combos within one race.

Betting Limits — Minimum and Maximum Stakes

We offer flexible bet limits so you can play your way—from smaller stakes for steady sessions to larger amounts for confident strategies. Minimums are ideal for exploring markets and managing your bankroll, while maximums support high-intensity play when you want bigger scenarios. Limits can vary by market and bet type, and you’ll always see the exact figures at the point of placing your bet.


Game Type Min Bet Max Bet
Sport. Single A$1 A$10,000
Sport. Multi A$1 A$10,000
Racing. Win/Place A$1 A$10,000
Racing. Quinella/Exacta A$1 A$5,000
Racing. Trifecta/First Four A$1 A$2,500
Racing. Quaddie A$1 A$2,000
Same Game Multi A$1 A$5,000
Same Race Multi A$1 A$5,000

Withdrawals and Payout Speed — How We Pay Your Winnings

We structure payouts so you receive winnings quickly and understand each step of processing. Once you request a withdrawal, the system logs your request, runs security checks, and confirms payee details are correct. For new accounts or profile changes, identity verification may be required—this protects your balance and prevents third-party cashouts.


Speed depends on the method you choose: instant bank rails are typically faster, while standard bank transfers can take longer due to bank processing. We aim to process requests efficiently and keep you informed on status so you’re never left guessing. If needed, support can help confirm details and prevent delays caused by input errors. We recommend using methods registered in your name and keeping your profile up to date to streamline checks.


We also apply withdrawal limits to keep processing stable and risk-managed, with exact figures depending on your account status and method. Inside your account, you can see available options, current limits, and full transaction history for complete control. We focus on transparency so you know when funds are sent and what steps are required.


Withdrawal Methods

  • • Bank transfer to your account: a reliable option for regular payouts.
  • • Instant transfer (PayID/Osko): a faster route to your bank.
  • • Card withdrawal (where available in your account): a convenient everyday option.

Processing Timeframes

  • • Request review and approval: typically up to 1–12 hours.
  • • PayID/Osko crediting: from minutes to a few hours.
  • • Bank transfer crediting: usually 1–5 business days, bank-dependent.

Withdrawal Limits

  • • Minimum amount: from A$10 (method-dependent).
  • • Daily limit: up to A$10,000 (by method and status).
  • • Monthly limit: tailored to your profile and verification status.

items.title: How fast is account setup?
items.answer: Sign-up takes only a few minutes, and once your profile is set, you can access markets immediately.

items.title: What’s the minimum deposit?
items.answer: Minimum deposit commonly starts from A$10, with exact amounts shown in the cashier.

items.title: What if a bet is settled differently than I expected?
items.answer: Message support via live chat—we’ll review the market rules and explain the settlement clearly.

items.title: How do multis work?
items.answer: Pick multiple selections and combine them into one bet; Same Game Multi and Same Race Multi are available where applicable.

items.title: Do you offer responsible play tools?
items.answer: Yes—set limits and use breaks or self-exclusion to keep control of your play.
